entry.title: Thursday: Near blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30. POP 30%
